text: (6 August 1972 â€“ 27 March 2019) was a Japanese tattoo artist and musician. He was best known for his appearances in the TLC reality show Miami Ink. He was a member of the punk rock band Big Deal. Harada and fellow tattooist, Darren Brass, founded the baby clothing company Ruthless & Toothless together. Harada was from Tokyo. He moved to the United States when he was 24 years of age. He was married twice and had a daughter. He died on 27 March 2019 in the Netherlands, at the age of 46. == References == == Other websites == * Ruthless & Toothless Category:1972 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Japanese artists Category:Musicians from Tokyo Category:Punk musicians Category:Participants in American reality television series Category:Rock musicians
title: Yoji Harada
